duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate new revenue for the company within the assigned geographical area.
Manage independent distributors and sales representatives to achieve and exceed performance goals.
Develop monthly sales quotas for territories and project expected sales volume for existing and new products.
Think like a P&L owner, develop a deep understanding of the market, competition and provide region-specific insights.
Aggressively visit hospitals and solicit orders from present and prospective customers for the assigned products.
Manage penetration within targeted new accounts with a regional perspective.
Manage independent sales teams' communication and sales support infrastructure to ensure customer satisfaction.
Recruit, train, and oversee the development of sales professionals.
Establish and maintain effective one-to-one relationships with sales professionals through counseling and leadership skills.
Track the performance trends of sales professionals and assure adherence to all standards, policies, and procedures.
Build rapport and trust with key stakeholders to foster strong connectivity.
Coordinate training events for sales personnel within the region.
Assess the quality of the sales force and recommend necessary changes to accomplish sales objectives.
Provide senior sales management with regular reports regarding the region's strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and threats.
Provide constant interaction with senior sales management regarding area sales objectives.
Provide senior sales management with weekly reports regarding travel schedules.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, Marketing, or related field (Master's preferred)
